backend/main.mo: Defines an actor with access control, user profiles, customer structures, authorization helpers, and profile management logic with role checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing files, components, and tests related to rollback from draft version 8 to version 6.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of prewritten summaries describing key frontend files and their functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting AquaFlow metadata, favicon, and bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app with Internet Identity auth, deterministic bootstrap timeout, profile fetch handling, and role‑based routing.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Responsive application shell with navigation, branding, notifications, and logout workflow.
frontend/src/components/AuthBootstrapRec: Timeout recovery screen offering retry and session‑clearing options when app bootstrap exceeds time limits.
frontend/src/components/AuthProfileLoadE: UI screen showing profile load errors with retry and logout actions based on sanitized error messages.
frontend/src/components/NotificationsBel: Notification bell component displaying mock unread notifications inside a popover.
frontend/src/config/branding.ts: Centralized branding object defining app name, tagline, location, and description.
frontend/src/features/reports/pdfGenerat: Generates a styled HTML-based PDF report including branding, logo, metadata, and tabular data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Hooks for fetching the caller's user profile, role, and admin status with detailed state flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, login/clear functions, and identity initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Mutation hook for saving the caller's user profile with error handling and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS theme definitions for light and dark modes with water-themed color variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point configuring React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/AdminDashb: Shows admin metrics and mock data tables for customers, deliveries, messages, and requests.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/CustomerDa: Provides customers with delivery stats, request forms, and history using mock data.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/SalesmanDa: Allows salesmen to record deliveries, view stats, and review recent activity with mock data.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Handles Internet Identity login and routes users to onboarding or role-based dashboards.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/AdminOnboa: Admin onboarding form that saves profile data and redirects to the admin dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/CustomerOn: Customer onboarding form that saves the user's profile with a customer role and redirects to the customer dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/RoleSelect: Role selection screen allowing users to enter their name, choose a role, save their profile, and navigate to the appropriate dashboard with error handling.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/SalesmanOn: Salesman onboarding form that creates a salesman profile and redirects to the salesman dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/ReportsPage.tsx: Displays available report options based on user role and generates mock PDF reports.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Utility functions for formatting AED currency values and per-bottle AED rates.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using both query strings and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, branding changes, architecture notes, known issues, and existing features.
